Gumdrop

Uses of Interface
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth.Realm

  • Packages that use Realm 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth
    Authentication and authorization framework for Gumdrop servers.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp.file
    Filesystem-based FTP handler implementations.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap
    IMAP4rev2 server implementation for Gumdrop.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3
    POP3 (Post Office Protocol version 3) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.quota
    Storage quota management for Gumdrop services.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet
    Servlet 4.0 container implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp
    SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implementation.

    • Uses of Realm in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth

      Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth that implement Realm 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BasicRealm
      Simple realm composed of static principals declared in an XML configuration resource.
      class  LDAPRealm
      LDAP-backed Realm for authenticating users against a directory server.
      class  OAuthRealm
      OAuth 2.0 Realm implementation for token-based authentication.
      Methods in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth that return Realm 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Realm BasicRealm.forSelectorLoop​(SelectorLoop loop)

      Realm OAuthRealm.forSelectorLoop​(SelectorLoop loop)  
      Realm Realm.forSelectorLoop​(SelectorLoop loop)
      Returns a Realm instance bound to the specified SelectorLoop.
